blogPost.excerpt: TheProdcast is a technology podcast featuring seasoned product professionals, CEOs, Founders, and VCs. While our Season 1 focused on the stars behind stellar products that people love, Season 2 is all about impactful stories of promising women techologists.
blogPost.body: TheProdcast is a technology podcast featuring seasoned product professionals, CEOs, Founders, and VCs. While our Season 1 focused on the stars behind stellar products that people love, Season 2 is all about impactful stories of promising women techologists.
blogPost.title: TheProdcast - A podcast featuring impactful technology & product stories
blogPost.author: Aishwarya Ashok

localize.description: TheProdcast是一个由经验丰富的产品专家、CEO、创始人和VC组成的技术播客。我们的第一季聚焦于人们喜爱的明星产品背后的明星，第二季则是关于有前途的女性技术专家的影响故事。
localize.tagline: 一个以有影响力的技术和产品故事为主题的播客。

localize.description: TheProdcast是一個由經驗豐富的產品專家、CEO、創始人和VC組成的技術播客。我們的第一季聚焦於人們喜愛的明星產品背後的明星，第二季則是關於有前途的女性技術專家的影響故事。
localize.tagline: 一個以有影響力的技術和產品故事爲主題的播客。

previous.excerpt: A web-based design tool to generate unique SVG design assets for websites, social media, blog posts, pitch decks, and more! Choose a visual from our growing list of generators, customize, randomize, and export it as an SVG or a PNG.
previous.title: Haikei - Generate unique SVG design assets in just a few seconds

localize.description: 一个基于网络的设计工具，可以为网站、社交媒体、博客文章、广告牌等生成独特的SVG设计资产。从我们不断增长的生成器列表中选择一个视觉效果，自定义，随机化，并将其导出为SVG或PNG。
localize.tagline: 只需几秒钟就能生成独特的SVG设计资产。

localize.description: 一個基於網絡的設計工具，可以爲網站、社交媒體、博客文章、廣告牌等生成獨特的SVG設計資產。從我們不斷增長的生成器列表中選擇一個視覺效果，自定義，隨機化，並將其導出爲SVG或PNG。
localize.tagline: 只需幾秒鐘就能生成獨特的SVG設計資產。

next.excerpt: CoinGecko provides a fundamental analysis of the crypto market. In addition to tracking price, volume and market capitalization, CoinGecko tracks community growth, open-source code development, major events and on-chain metrics.
next.title: CoinGecko - 360-degree overview of the crypto market

localize.description: CoinGecko提供加密市场的基本分析。除了跟踪价格、交易量和市值，CoinGecko还跟踪社区增长、开源代码开发、重大事件和链上指标。
CoinGecko提供加密市場的基本分析。除了跟蹤價格、交易量和市值，CoinGecko還跟蹤社區增長、開源代碼開發、重大事件和鏈上指標。
